summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding a real estate transaction involving a property at 338 Washington Rd, Bradford, NH. The emails discuss title searches, closing dates, and the need for extensions in the due diligence period. Several individuals are involved in the transaction, including an attorney and a real estate agent.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is seeking assistance with a real estate transaction and has reached out to an attorney for help with the title search and closing.

connections.description: Steve Marshal is seeking legal assistance from M for a real estate transaction.
El referred Steve Marshal to M for legal assistance in his real estate transaction.
PH is the contact person from Title and will be working under M's guidance in the transaction.

events.title: Effective Date of Purchase and Sale Agreement
events.description: The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement (P&S) is noted as November 19, although the seller did not sign until November 20.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing for the real estate transaction is set for December 13.

keyFacts: The effective date of the Purchase and Sale Agreement is marked as November 19, 2019.
The closing date for the real estate transaction is set for December 13, 2019.
Steve Marshal is coordinating with an attorney for assistance with the title search and closing.
There is a need for an extension of the due diligence period for the transaction.
The correspondence emphasizes the importance of verifying wire instructions to prevent fraud.
